title: Linux vmstat Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the powerful vmstat command in Linux, learn how to monitor system performance, and analyze CPU, memory, and disk I/O metrics with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux vmstat Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the powerful vmstat command in Linux, learn how to monitor system performance, and analyze CPU, memory, and disk I/O metrics with practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, vmstat, system monitoring, performance analysis, CPU, memory, disk I/O

verify.name: Verify vmstat command output
verify.hint: Ensure that the vmstat command is executed correctly and displays the expected output, which should include the "procs" header.

verify.name: Verify vmstat output for CPU, memory, and disk I/O
verify.hint: Ensure that the vmstat command displays the expected output, including the "cpu", "memory", and "io" sections.

steps.title: Analyzing CPU, Memory, and Disk I/O with vmstat
